name: App-Lab-Analyzer
description: The App Lab Analyzer script is a Python tool designed for comprehensive analysis of applications, websites, databases, or any online directories. It analyzes files, file sizes, file types, folder structure, functions within files, and provides insights into the overall purpose of the given digital entity.
